con:call.name: ChangeDefaultPaymentMethod Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2020/21/swsim/SwsimV106">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:ChangeDefaultPaymentMethod>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <sws:MachineInfo>\r <sws:IPAddress>?</sws:IPAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:MacAddress>?</sws:MacAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP1>cid:320263658849</sws:FP1>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP2>cid:1004684607134</sws:FP2>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP3>cid:1270872000329</sws:FP3>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP4>cid:530465788888</sws:FP4>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:FP5>cid:1080613163754</sws:FP5>\r </sws:FP>\r </sws:MachineInfo>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PaymentType>?</sws:PaymentType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PaymentMethodID>?</sws:PaymentMethodID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:SendEmail>?</sws:SendEmail>\r </sws:ChangeDefaultPaymentMethod>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
